title: Arabic 59
text: Thy heart is My home; sanctify it for My descent. Thy spirit is My place of revelation; cleanse it for My manifestation.

prev.title: Arabic 58
prev.text: The temple of being is My throne; cleanse it of all things, that there I may be established and there I may abide.
prev.teaser: The temple of being is My throne...

next.title: Arabic 60
next.text: Put thy hand into My bosom, that I may rise above thee, radiant and resplendent.
